author: senh
title: Walking with whales in South Africa
text: BING NEWS: Other earth: A close encounter of the blubbery kind while cruising New Zealand's sub-Antarctic islands He brandished his walking stick, ordered me to ‘Move!’ and sent the beast packing. We were sailing from Auckland to Dunedin via the Antipodes, Snares, Bounty, Campbell and Auckland Islands – remote outcrops to the south and east of New Zealand. 09/19/2015 - 10:41 pm | View Link Must-see: Seal catches ride on humpback whale in amazing viral photo You’d almost think this seal were walking on ... the coast of New South Wales, she told the Sydney Morning Herald. The seal was actually riding a humpback whale. No fooling, she said.
